title: 如何用summon指令刷凋零骷髅和远古守卫者
author: 黑茶RGO
txt_content: 会的麻烦告诉我一下指令，谢谢

replies.author: 炽晖君GGGOOO
replies.txt_content: 推荐你网址www.summon-helper.net 进去后自己看

replies.author: RAY5DHao
replies.txt_content:
凋灵骷髅:summon指令后面加{SkeletonType:1}
远古守卫者:summon指令后面加{Elder:1}

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content:
炽晖君GGGOOO 发表于 2014-9-8 10:40
推荐你网址www.summon-helper.net 进去后自己看
没有守卫者

replies.author: PotatoMaster101
replies.txt_content:
/summon Guardian ~ ~1 ~ {Elder:1b}复制代码
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {SkeletonType:1}复制代码
